hero.title: Transparency on donation usage
hero.subtitle: Every euro donated is tracked, verified and proven. So that trust is no longer just a promise.

donors.title: Donor side
donors.text: "I don't know how my money is being used." 6 out of 10 donors want more transparency on how their donations are used.

associations.title: Association side
associations.text: "Proving our good management takes forever." Associations spend hundreds of hours producing reports to reassure their funders.

items.title: Total transparency
items.text: Every donation is recorded with unfalsifiable cryptographic proof. Donors see exactly where their money goes.

items.title: Verifiable proof
items.text: Every expense comes with a timestamped and verified receipt. No more opaque reports.

items.title: Total simplicity
items.text: No need to understand blockchain. Donors give in euros, associations spend in euros.

items.title: The association registers
items.text: Free registration in 5 minutes. Automatic verification via the SIRENE directory.

items.title: The donor gives in euros
items.text: Simple donation by card or bank transfer. Automatic conversion and on-chain recording.

items.title: Every euro is tracked
items.text: Expenses recorded with receipts. Digital tax receipt (NFT) for the donor.

guarantee.title: Traceability guarantee
guarantee.text: Our technology relies on the Ethereum blockchain and regulated stablecoins (EUR CoinVertible by SG-Forge). Every transaction is immutable, publicly verifiable, and compliant with European regulations.

items.title: Platform
items.text: Technical architecture validated. Smart contracts in development. Donor interface in design.

items.title: Partnerships
items.text: Strategic partnership with SG-Forge (Société Générale) for EUR CoinVertible stablecoin management.

items.title: Beta launch
items.text: Pilot program with 5 partner associations planned for Q3 2025. Registrations open.

items.question: Do I need to understand blockchain to use Lien commun?
items.answer: No, absolutely not. Lien commun is designed to be as simple as a bank transfer. The blockchain works in the background, you never need to interact with it directly.

items.question: How are donations tracked?
items.answer: Each donation is converted to stablecoin (EUR CoinVertible) and recorded on the Ethereum blockchain. Each association expense is also recorded with a timestamped receipt.

items.question: Do I receive a tax receipt?
items.answer: Yes. Each donation automatically generates a digital tax receipt in the form of an NFT, which you can download or keep in your donor space.

items.question: Which associations can register?
items.answer: Any association registered in the SIRENE directory can register for free. Verification is automatic.

items.question: How much does it cost?
items.answer: Registration is free for associations and donors. Lien commun charges a 2.5% commission on each donation to fund the platform and blockchain fees.

items.question: Is the data secure?
items.answer: Yes. Personal data is stored encrypted and GDPR compliant. Only transaction proofs are public on the blockchain (without personal data).
